name: StarRupture Dedicated Server (Wine + SteamCMD | Pelican FIXED)
author: curtis
description: StarRupture Dedicated Server running on Linux via Wine (no root), SteamCMD Windows install, Xvfb user-space fix for Pelican.
startup:
bash -lc 'cd /home/container || exit 1

# ---------- ENV ----------
export HOME=/home/container
export WINEPREFIX="${WINEPREFIX:-/home/container/.wine}"
export WINEDEBUG="${WINEDEBUG:--all}"
mkdir -p "$WINEPREFIX" /home/container/.xvfb

# ---------- Xvfb wrapper (Pelican-safe) ----------
xvfb() { xvfb-run -f /home/container/.Xauthority -s "-screen 0 1024x768x16 -nolisten tcp -ac" "$@"; }

# ---------- Wine init (first run only) ----------
if [ ! -f "$WINEPREFIX/.init_done" ]; then
  echo "[SR] Initializing Wine prefix"
  xvfb wineboot -u || true
  if command -v winetricks >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    xvfb winetricks -q vcrun2022 || true
  fi
  touch "$WINEPREFIX/.init_done"
fi

# ---------- Locate server executable ----------
SERVER_EXEC=""
for p in "./StarRupture/Binaries/Win64/StarRuptureServerEOS-Win64-Shipping.exe" "./StarRupture/Binaries/Win64/StarRuptureServerEOS.exe" "./StarRuptureServerEOS.exe"; do
  [ -f "$p" ] && SERVER_EXEC="$p" && break
done
if [ -z "$SERVER_EXEC" ]; then
  SERVER_EXEC="$(find . -maxdepth 10 -type f \( -iname "*StarRuptureServerEOS*" -o -iname "*Win64-Shipping.exe" \) 2>/dev/null | head -n 1)"
fi
if [ -z "$SERVER_EXEC" ]; then
  echo "[SR] ERROR: StarRupture server executable not found."
  ls -la
  exit 1
fi

# ---------- Build arguments ----------
ARGS="-Log -Port=${SERVER_PORT} -QueryPort=${QUERY_PORT} -ServerName=\"${SERVER_NAME}\""
[ -n "${MULTIHOME:-}" ] && ARGS="$ARGS -MULTIHOME=${MULTIHOME}"
[ -n "${MAX_PLAYERS:-}" ] && ARGS="$ARGS -MaxPlayers=${MAX_PLAYERS}"
[ -n "${EXTRA_ARGS:-}" ] && ARGS="$ARGS ${EXTRA_ARGS}"

# ---------- Run ----------
echo "[SR] Starting StarRupture: $SERVER_EXEC $ARGS"

term_handler() {
  echo "[SR] Stop signal received"
  kill -TERM "$SR_PID" 2>/dev/null || true
  wait "$SR_PID" 2>/dev/null || true
  exit 0
}
trap term_handler SIGTERM SIGINT

xvfb wine "$SERVER_EXEC" $ARGS -unattended &
SR_PID=$!
wait "$SR_PID"'

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -e

APPID=3809400
STEAM_USER="${STEAM_USER:-anonymous}"
STEAM_PASS="${STEAM_PASS:-}"
STEAM_AUTH="${STEAM_AUTH:-}"

mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

curl -sSL -o steamcmd_linux.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamapps

./steamcmd.sh \
  +@ShutdownOnFailedCommand 1 \
  +@NoPromptForPassword 1 \
  +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows \
  +@sSteamCmdForcePlatformBitness 64 \
  +force_install_dir /mnt/server \
  +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} ${STEAM_AUTH} \
  +app_update ${APPID} validate \
  +quit

if ! find /mnt/server -type f -iname '*StarRuptureServerEOS*exe' | grep -q .; then
  echo "[SR] ERROR: SteamCMD install failed. If you see 'Missing configuration', use a real Steam account."
  exit 1
fi

echo "[SR] Installation complete."
